resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156579</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2066</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Students' perception of cooperative learning in Earth Science Fieldwork</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorstellung der Kursteilnehmer des kooperativen 
Lernens in der Geowissenschaft-Feldarbeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La perception des étudiants de l'étude 
coopérative dans des travaux sur le terrain de science de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Percepção dos estudantes da aprendizagem 
cooperativa no fieldwork da ciência de terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Percezione degli allievi di imparare cooperativo 
nei lavori sul terreno di scienze della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίληψη σπουδαστών για τη συνεταιριστική εκμάθηση 
στην εργασία υπαίθριου γήινης επιστήμης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Opinión de los estudiantes de aprender 
cooperativo en trabajo en el terreno de la geología</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a report of the findings of a small-scale study of student perceptions about the effects of fieldwork,on their learning</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">field work</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Report der Entdeckungen einer 
kleinräumigen Studie der Kursteilnehmervorstellungen über die 
Effekte von Feldarbeit, auf ihrem Lernen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un état des résultats d'une étude de 
petite taille des perceptions d'étudiant au sujet des effets des 
travaux sur le terrain, sur leur étude</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um relatório dos findings de um estudo 
small-scale de percepções do estudante sobre os efeitos do 
fieldwork, na sua aprendizagem</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un rapporto dei risultati di uno studio 
su scala ridotta sulle percezioni dell'allievo circa gli effetti di 
lavori sul terreno, sul loro imparare</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια έκθεση των συμπερασμάτων μιας μικρής 
κλίμακας μελέτης των αντιλήψεων σπουδαστών για τα αποτελέσματα 
της εργασίας υπαίθριου, στην εκμάθησή τους</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es un informe de los resultados de un 
estudio en reducida escala de las opiniones del estudiante sobre los 
efectos del trabajo en el terreno, al su aprender</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lernenstrategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fangen Sie Arbeit auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stratégies d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">travaux sur le terrain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estratégias de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">trabalho de campo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strategie di apprendimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lavoro di campo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στρατηγικές εκμάθησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιτόπια έρευνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estrategias que aprenden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">trabajo en el terreno</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
